name: Beardo
description:
Controls:

Hold down MouseButton/Spacebar to grab Snoob. While grabbing snoob wall will not damage you, but other Snoobs will.

Release MouseButton/Spacebar to let go of Snoob.

Get as far as you can!

Beardo is an infinite-play style game where you navigate Beardo through a never-ending onslaught of menacing snoobs who want nothing more than to steal his beard and prevent him from running errands at the local convenience store!

Use Beardo's glorious beard to swing from snoob to snoob in an effort to get the highest score possible! Don't collide with any snoobs, the laser boundaries, or detach Beardo's beard while he's outside the lasers or he'll explode!
